name: Step of the Wind
trigger: when you choose to move swiftly
effects: you can take the Dash action as a bonus action
if you expend 1 Focus Point, you can take both the Disengage and Dash actions as a bonus action
if you expend 1 Focus Point, your jump distance is doubled for the turn
limits: the Disengage + Dash option costs 1 Focus Point
